ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
comments: 4 hours.

narratives.question_text: Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: The course gives previews to some interesting genetics topics and provides useful statistical methods.The only weakness is that the instructor did not explain some topics in depth. It is hard for a student without biology background like me.
It gives a very good introduction to the area of statistical genetics.
Good course, need some bio background
great.hard to catch up.
great class for people interested in genetics researching, I enjoyed.

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Hongyu Zhao  Hongyu gives organized lectures, but it is hard to reach Hongyu outside the classroom.
Instructor: Hongyu Zhao  He teaches very well. The co-instructor Kenneth Kidd too.
Instructor: Hongyu Zhao  Great professor, detailed and responsible
Instructor: Hongyu Zhao  great.But could you slow the pace next time?
Instructor: Hongyu Zhao  helpful in and after class, super nice and reachable

narratives.question_text: If this course included instruction by a teaching assistant (TA), please evaluate the TA here. What are the strengths and weaknesses and how might their teaching be improved? (Specify name of the TA).
comments: Instructor: Zhixiang Lin  Zhixiang is very responsible and helpful. His TA sessions were excellent.
Instructor: Zhixiang Lin  He did a good job.
Instructor: Zhixiang Lin  Great TA, grade HW very carefully
Instructor: Zhixiang Lin  good
Instructor: Zhixiang Lin  nice and flexible, very helpful!

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend it to someone interested in the field of genetics.
Yes.
yes. it's very very helpful!
a little bit hard for students with no genetics background, maybe a little bit more after class hws or exams
